entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
